data.text:
Lovely hotel, staff friendly Zing Bar has amazing staff - Jane, Bernard and Nelson who worked at the Zing made my stay great due to outstanding level of customer services. Professionalism outstanding. In the hotel reception Angie was a star, her commitment to us as guest can not be understated  she is a credit to the Hilton chain.
Plan to return to Dubai and intend to stay at this hotel again.
data.title: First Trip to Dubai

data.text: Perfect location, great beach, very good services, great food, no issues with cleanliness, ...There is a desk in the lobby for trip packages in Dubai and surrounding that we found very convenient. Overall, a very good choice for us to stay at Hilton.
data.title: Very good experience to stay at Hilton.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear georged19670AY,

Thank you for taking the time to review your visit with us. We will let Arbab Khan knows that you were pleased with his service.

Thank you once again for your loyalty and for recommending us. We do look forward to welcoming you again for your next trip to Hilton Dubai Jumeirah.

Best Regards,
Jean Sebastien Kling
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Jean Sebastien Kling

data.text: Came back to our favourite hotel where the all the staff are great with a super location right on JBR ... The beach is amazing, the breakfast is superb with a great choice and good service by Jegan and his team. The Executive Lounge staff are all very friendly and helpful, especially Lydia - there was a great afternoon tea and "happy hour" in the evening.  Pooja and her team even went above and beyond to organise a lovely surprise for my son's birthday yesterday - something we will treasure as a lovely memory. I would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel especially as we have been coming back over and over again and getting consistent great service from all the staff.
data.title: Consistant Great Service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear VS1706,

Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent visit to Hilton Dubai Jumeirah. 

We're glad to hear that you had a memorable experience with us.

Service is one of the most important aspects of a hotel, and I am incredibly pleased to hear nothing but great feedback from you regarding the service our team members provided especially Lydia and Pooja.

Thank you once again for your loyalty and for recommending us. We do look forward to welcoming you again for your next trip to Hilton Dubai Jumeirah.

Best Regards,
Jean Sebastien Kling
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Jean Sebastien Kling

data.text: This hotel was absolutely wonderful!! The location, staff, and room is superb! I was helped by Mani and Dipti who was super kind and friendly. But most important, the location is PERFECT, if you’re looking for a hotel in the middle of everything Jumeirah this is it! I went to multiple areas and getting to and from was very easy!
data.title: Perfect Location and Service

data.text:
We had a lovely 10 night stay here over Easter. 
The place is kept immaculately clean. The staff are the most pleasant people you will ever meet, they can’t do enough for you. 
We were there for our anniversary and the staff had put a lovely banner and rose petals on our bed. They also delivered us a thoughtful slice of cake. We were offered a room upgrade, but as we would have to move rooms mid stay, we turned it down. 

The food is plentiful and varied. We did half board. You could use your half board credit, 100AED per adult and 50AED per child, at one of the on site restaurants. Or just eat in the hotel restaurant. 
1) Trader Vics
2) Vero 
3) Wave breaker (I’ve reviewed all separately)

Trader Vics was my personal favourite! Probably due to the fabulous cocktails!

Our room 463 had a magic view. We enjoyed many evening sitting out on the balcony. 

As with most hotels, the rooms could do with a refurb, esp the bathroom. Also I would have loved a drying rail outside on the balcony for swimwear etc. the string over the bath did very little to dry clothes. 
But all in all the room was very comfy! 

My only pet peeve with this hotel was “the dance of the sun beds”. The towel hut opened at 8am, and yet at 7am people already had loungers reserved with towels. 
As there are very few loungers around the pool, we ended up having to play this game too. Due to the fact that we have a 6yr old and needed to be able to see him in the pool. So we had to start setting the alarm to ensure we got a lounger. Not very 5* Dubai behaviour, but needs must. 🤦🏼‍♀️🤷‍♀️

During our final breakfast we were given a lovely piece of ginger carrot cake, with “see you soon” written below it. Such a wonderfully kind gesture. 

We would definitely come back to Hilton Jumeirah Beach Dubai ❤️
data.title: Wonderful ❤️

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 063520Rlaurad,

Thank you for taking the time to leave such a glowing review of your recent stay at Hilton Dubai Jumeirah. I am thrilled to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel and appreciated the room view, facilities, amenities, and service provided by our team members.

Your constructive feedback on the sunbeds and ageing of the hotel is well accepted and will be discussed internally as part of our continuous improvement plan. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.

Thank you once again for your loyalty and for recommending us. We do look forward to welcoming you again for your next trip to Hilton Dubai Jumeirah.

Best Regards,
Jean Sebastien Kling
Cluster General Manager
owner_response.author: Jean Sebastien Kling
